channel.title: Destiny Church Glasgow Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Destiny Church
channel.itunes:summary: Join Senior Pastors Andrew & Sue Owen and their team with these life-giving messages from Destiny Church Glasgow.
channel.description: Join Senior Pastors Andrew & Sue Owen and their team with these life-giving messages from Destiny Church Glasgow.

item.title: Destiny - Part 5: Today's the Day!
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Book 'Destiny'
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: Join Senior Pastor as he unpacks 'Destiny' Study 4 - 'Tram Tracks and Sign Posts

item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Book 'Destiny'
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: Join Senior Pastor as he unpacks 'Destiny' Study 4 - 'Tram Tracks and Sign Posts

item.title: Destiny - Part 3: Let the Future In!
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Book 'Destiny'
item.itunes:author: Craig Denham
item.itunes:summary: Join Lead Pastor Craig Denham as he unpacks 'Destiny' Study 3 - 'Let the Future In'.

item.title: Destiny - Part 2: Finding Direction
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Book 'Destiny'
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: Join Senior Pastor Andrew Owen as he unpacks 'Destiny' Study 2 - 'Finding Direction'.

item.title: Destiny - Part 1: Why Am I Here?
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to the Book 'Destiny'
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: Join Senior Pastor Andrew Owen as he unpacks 'Destiny' Study 1 - 'Why Am I Here?'.

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 7: Join Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Join Me
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: "Compromise is accepting what you don’t believe because you refuse to fight for what you do believe" What convictions do you hold? Are you trying to choose God's call on your life? Senior Pastor Andrew Owen concludes the Mission Possible series asking if you'll stand for what you believe in? Join Andrew in the seventh and final instalment of the series; "Join Me".

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 6: Obey Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Obey Me
item.itunes:author: Chris Bailey
item.itunes:summary: "Never be average again, it all starts with obeying God." Are you stuck in one place? Have you decided that it's time to move forward? Join our guest speaker Chris Bailey, as he brings the profound sixth instalment of the Mission Possible series "Obey Me".

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 5: Serve Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Serve Me
item.itunes:author: Dan Owen
item.itunes:summary: "God has designed His body - to grow. It's natural for it to grow." Are you getting involved with what He is doing? Are you ready and willing? Join Dan Owen as he continues to unpack what it means to truly serve in the fifth instalment of the Mission Possible series 'Serve Me'.

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 4: Show Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Show Me
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: "...being His disciples, we would be His representation, His reflection... as He is in this world" What do people see when they look at you? What do you represent in this world? Join Senior Pastor Andrew Owen as he unpacks what it means to represent Jesus in the fourth instalment of the Mission Possible series 'Show Me'.

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 3: Know Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Know Me
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: "God is life, and knowing Him gives us abundant life" What does it mean to know God? How can you get to know God? Senior Pastor Andrew Owen continues the Mission Possible series by addressing these questions in the third instalment "Know Me".

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 2: Trust Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Trust Me
item.itunes:author: Dan Owen
item.itunes:summary: “People don’t know who or what to trust in anymore…” Where do you place your trust? Why can we trust God? Dan Owen continues the Mission Possible series with the second instalment 'Trust Me'.

item.title: Mission Possible - Part 1: Follow Me
item.itunes:subtitle: Follow Me
item.itunes:author: Craig Denham
item.itunes:summary: "the antidote to pointless living is to live for something greater than yourself." What do you think when you hear "follow me"? Is it an invitation, or a command? Pastor Craig Denham kicks off the Mission Possible series with a thought-provoking look at Jesus' words to His people; "Follow Me".

item.title: Point of Contact - Part 6
item.itunes:subtitle: The Power and Significance of Communion
item.itunes:author: Andrew Owen
item.itunes:summary: Join Senior Pastor Andrew Owen as he unpacks communion in a whole new way.
